# 使用计算机视觉实战项目精通 OpenCV（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi
shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi
shiyong-jisuanji-shijue-shizhan-xiangmu-jingtong-opencv-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
